## ZCurve.range() method

Yields iterator of Z-curve indices in given nD bounding box.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
range(rmin: ArrayLike<number>, rmax: ArrayLike<number>): Generator<bigint, void, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rmin | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | bbox min point |
|  rmax | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | bbox max point |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Generator<bigint, void, unknown>`

## Remarks

Uses [ZCurve.pointInBox()](./morton.zcurve.pointinbox.md) and [ZCurve.bigMin()](./morton.zcurve.bigmin.md) to efficiently skip Z index sub-ranges outside the box.
